name: MyleFly
overview:
MyleFly™ converts frequent flyers’ accumulated miles to exceptionally low-priced flight tickets.

It serves as an online trading platform for sellers of miles and buyers of flight tickets, offering airline customers a fully automated process whereby flight tickets are created out of loyalty club miles. Everybody who uses MyleFly™ wins – the ticket buyers, who can find the lowest prizes worldwide, frequent flyers, who can cash out their accumulated miles and the airlines themselves, who can use this mechanism to make it attractive for their loyalty club members to remain loyal
